metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0574 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Double free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.252 and 14.xand 15.x before 15.0.0.223 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.418 onLinux, Adobe AIR before 15.0.0.356, Adobe AIR SDK before 15.0.0.356, andAdobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 15.0.0.356 allows attackers to executearbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0574` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.418ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.418ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.418ubuntu0.14.04.1').
